add.title: Add
add.description: Add a new parent node for the selected text or nodes.

triangle.title: Triangle
triangle.description: Toggle triangle connectors for the selected terminal nodes.

adopt.title: Adopt
adopt.description: Adopt one or more nodes as children of the selected node.

disown.title: Disown
disown.description: Disown one or more children of the selected node.

resetPosition.title: Reset position
resetPosition.description: Relocate the selected nodes to their original positions.

selectTrees.title: Select trees
selectTrees.description: Select entire trees instead of individual nodes.

autoFormatBracketsAsSubscript.title: Format brackets/parentheses as subscript
autoFormatBracketsAsSubscript.description: When this is enabled, letters and numbers in parentheses or brackets such as (i) and [i] will automatically be rendered as subscript. (Does not work on all letters)

experimentalTextWidth.title: Use experimental node positioning method (slightly slower, more accurate)
